name: Work Rush (Level Cap Studios, Carolina Sayuri, Sunlight-91, rodrigodalmoro, takashi-san, Alexandre Theodoro, Gabriel Naves)
name_original: Work Rush (Level Cap Studios, Carolina Sayuri, Sunlight-91, rodrigodalmoro, takashi-san, Alexandre Theodoro, Gabriel Naves)
description:
A quirky action game with a unique and unpredictable humor about going back to work after the pandemic.

Controls:

Press the Left Mouse Button on the map to walk;

Use your mouse to solve the minigames;

Tips (pre-balancing):

You have to stand in front of the tasks for them to open.

If you see this pop up, click there:

Team:

Alexandre Theodoro - Game Designer and Marketing

Bruno Takashi - Programmer

Carolina Sayuri - Artist

Eber Filipe - Audio Design

Gabriel Naves - Programmer

Rodrigo Maya - Artist
